org.cougaar.core.component
Class AddonServiceBroker

java.lang.Object
  org.cougaar.core.component.AddonServiceBroker
All Implemented Interfaces:
ExtendedServiceBroker, ServiceBroker
Direct Known Subclasses:
ContainedBinderSupport.ContainedServiceBroker
public class AddonServiceBroker
extends java.lang.Object
implements ExtendedServiceBroker

A Simple ServiceBroker which does a simple delegation of service requests for most purposes, except that it has an escape hatch where extending classes may, in effect, themselves offer services directly to the requestors.

getCurrentServiceClasses

public final java.util.Iterator getCurrentServiceClasses()
Description copied from interface: ServiceBroker
Gets the currently available services for this context. All standard implementations return an Iterator over a copy of the set of ServiceClasses so that there is no risk of ComodificationException.

Specified by:
getCurrentServiceClasses in interface ServiceBroker

getService

public final <T> T getService(java.lang.Object requestor,
                              java.lang.Class<T> serviceClass,
                              ServiceRevokedListener srl)
Description copied from interface: ServiceBroker
get an instance of the requested service from a service provider associated with this context. May return null (if no provider found) and various RuntimeExceptions may be thrown by the associated ServiceProvider. The ServiceBroker itself may throw ClassCastException if the ServiceProvider returns a non-null service object which is not an instance of the requested serviceClass.

Note that a successful call to getService almost always implies memory allocation, often not garbage-collectable, due to internal references.

Specified by:
getService in interface ServiceBroker

public final ExtendedServiceBroker.ServiceResult getService(int requestorId,

                                                            boolean recordInView)

releaseService

public final void releaseService(java.lang.Object requestor,
                                 java.lang.Class serviceClass,
                                 java.lang.Object service)
Description copied from interface: ServiceBroker
Release a service object previously requested by a call to getService. Service object instances usually require significant non-GCable memory, so must be released to reclaim the memory and/or the associated resources.

Specified by:
releaseService in interface ServiceBroker

Specified by:
releaseService in interface ExtendedServiceBroker

hasLocalService

protected boolean hasLocalService(java.lang.Class serviceClass)
Defined by extending classes to respond to hasService calls from clients. A service need not be advertised here for getLocalService to work. The default implementation just returns false.

getCurrentLocalServiceClasses

protected java.util.Iterator getCurrentLocalServiceClasses()
Defined by extending classes to advertise a service to the clients. A service need not be advertised here for getLocalService to work. The default implementation returns null.

getLocalService

protected java.lang.Object getLocalService(java.lang.Object requestor,
                                           java.lang.Class serviceClass,
                                           ServiceRevokedListener srl)
Defined by extending classes to provide services to clients. The default implementation returns null.

releaseLocalService

protected boolean releaseLocalService(java.lang.Object requestor,
                                      java.lang.Class serviceClass,
                                      java.lang.Object service)
Defined by extending classes to release previously granted services. Should return true IFF the service was released. The default implementation returns false.
